attacks.name: Pressurized Gas
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Rocket Tackle
attacks.effect: Pupitar does 10 damage to itself. Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Pupitar by attacks during your opponent's next turn.
